title: Supplementary Figures
body: substrate scanning form complex in the entire asymmetric unit of the crystal. Table 1 , 2) were resolved in a 18% polyacrylamide denaturing gel 36 running for 3 hours. (c) 0.5, 2, 5 nM of FAN1 373-1017 wild type or 5 nM of D960A mutant 37 was incubated with 5' 32 P-radiolabeled 5' flap (10-1-10) substrate (5 nM) at 37 °C for 5 38 minutes, and the reaction mixtures were resolved in a 18% polyacrylamide denaturing 39 gel. dT 5 and dT 10 were loaded as size markers.
